channel.title: NPM on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in NPM on Orange Academy

item.title: Intro to NPM
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Demo setting up projects with npm and yarn Explain semantic versioning of dependencies Showcase using npm scripts Discuss Encapsulation with ES6 Modules Skills Use dependencies in your projects Write Modular Code npm & yarn Node uses a package management system to distribute open-source modules.

item.title: Labs for NPM
item.description: Lab 1 - Installing and Using Node Packages Create a new project named loggerApp Make sure to create new directory and cd into it

item.title: ES2015 Modules
item.description: ES2015 introduced a cleaner syntax for modules which consist of export and import statements. According to Mozilla…
